theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetic control of inflammatory response, immunosenescence, and cytokine markers predicting frailty and mortality.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights elevated inflammatory markers with age and accelerated inflammaging in progeroid syndrome, emphasizing cytokine-driven inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains inflammation as an antagonistic pleiotropy mechanism with lifetime infection exposure influencing inflammaging and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes sex/gender differences in innate and adaptive immunity changes that exacerbate inflammaging and senescent cell accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dysregulated immune responses and inflammatory pathways (NF-kB, NLRP3) driving inflammaging in periodontal disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Positions inflammaging as a mechanistic link to age-associated diseases, emphasizing systemic inflammation and therapeutic targeting.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine and Immune Dysregulation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes multiple sources of inflammatory stimuli driving chronic inflammation and aging, highlighting inflammation as a causal driver.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Psychosocial Stress-Linked Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links psychosocial stressors such as intimate partner violence to elevated inflammation and accelerated inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Introduces cold-inflammaging as a pre-phase of inflammaging, emphasizing homeostatic imbalance, SASP, gut microbiota, and molecular waste accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on immune dysregulation, cellular senescence with SASP, and epigenetic alterations contributing to inflammaging and metabolic disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes impaired resolution of inflammation due to macrophage dysfunction and reduced pro-resolving mediators leading to chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and Homeostatic Imbalance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes geroprotective interventions targeting inflammation and metabolic reprogramming downstream of inflammaging and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic low-grade systemic inflammation, immune tolerance breakdown, and immune dysregulation driving inflammaging and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes chronic systemic inflammation, inflammatory biomarkers, and links to telomere shortening as drivers of aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB Pathway-Mediated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights NF-kB activation as a central mechanism driving inflammaging and aging, with anti-inflammatory counter-regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammation-induced molecular changes including ion channel gene expression alterations linking inflammation to systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Dysfunction Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IL-1 driven chronic inflammation impairing hematopoietic stem cell function and promoting hematological aging pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immune Receptor and Interferon Signaling Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on upregulation of innate immune receptors and interferon signaling pathways driving inflammaging and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Tissue-Specific Inflammaging and Epidermal Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights skin epidermal dysfunction as a source of systemic inflammaging and target for intervention to reduce chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuroinflammation and Peripheral Immunosenescence Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes peripheral immune aging causing neuroinflammation via immune cell infiltration and cytokine imbalance leading to neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chemokine-Mediated Immune Cell Trafficking Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chemokine dysregulation driving immune cell recruitment and sustaining chronic inflammation in aging tissues.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes chronic low-grade inflammation genetically controlled and linked to age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on sex differences in inflammaging and its role in systemic aging and disease susceptibility.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB Pathway-Mediated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details NF-kB as a central transcriptional regulator of inflammaging and aging, modulated by natural compounds.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: T Cell Dysregulation-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-related T cell functional changes driving chronic low-grade inflammation and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: NF-kB Pathway-Mediated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights NF-kB and proinflammatory mediators as central to chronic inflammation and immune dysregulation in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Tissue-Specific Inflammaging and Epidermal Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging-driven epidermal homeostasis imbalance and premature skin aging triggered by environmental factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Regulation of Cytokine-Mediated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cytokine gene polymorphisms influencing inflammatory profiles and longevity, with gender-specific effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Dysfunction and Inflammaging Interplay Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes inflammaging’s impact on stem cell physiology, including epigenetic and mitochondrial dysfunctions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links inflammaging and immunosenescence to tissue dysfunction and aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Tissue-Specific Inflammaging and Epidermal Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on skin inflammaging driven by environmental exposure causing senescence and homeostasis imbalance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Dysfunction Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging-induced miRNA dysregulation linking IL6 and TNF signaling to HSC aging and malignancy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cytokine balance and nutrition shaping inflammaging and aging trajectories.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine Dual-Role Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes the dichotomous beneficial and detrimental roles of cytokines in inflammaging and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Nutrition and Microbiota Modulated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes dietary and gut microbiota influences on inflammaging and aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Immune Dysregulation and Chronic Inflammation Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on heterogeneity of inflammaging shaped by lifelong exposures and development of inflammatory aging biomarkers.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Regulation of Cytokine-Mediated Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights genetic and metabolic modulation of pro- and anti-inflammatory responses influencing healthy aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Context-Dependent Eco-Evolutionary Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Views inflammaging as a variable, context-dependent process shaped by evolutionary, environmental, and individual factors.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gut Microbiota and Intestinal Barrier Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on gut inflammaging driven by microbiome dysbiosis and barrier dysfunction accelerating systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immune Gene Upregulation Conserved Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes conserved innate immune gene overexpression and inflammaging as a causal mechanism of aging across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Psychosocial Stress-Linked Systemic Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links psychosocial stressors such as intimate partner violence to elevated inflammation accelerating biological aging.
